description.raw:
The ubuntu_auto builds have been failing for this repo because the pipelines configuration specifies ubuntu:16.04 instead of ubuntu:xenial, which caused apt to be configured incorrectly.

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_common-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=1)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/1/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/1/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_common-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=2)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/2/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/2/

We could probably work around this in release-tools, but it's easier to just fix this here.
description.html:
The ubuntu_auto builds have been failing for this repo because the pipelines configuration specifies ubuntu:16.04 instead of ubuntu:xenial, which caused apt to be configured incorrectly.

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/1/
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/2/

We could probably work around this in release-tools, but it's easier to just fix this here.

title.raw: use xenial instead of 16.04 in pipelines image to fix jenkins ubuntu_auto build
